Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Chicago.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
